irgroupproject.tbn
Class TBN

java.lang.Object
  irgroupproject.tbn.TBN

public class TBN
extends java.lang.Object

GUI class for our TBN. Provides a Tree-View to view the entire contents of the index, including terms and relationships.

Also provides necesssary capabilities to perform basic CRUD operations on both Concept items and Relationship objects.

Author:
kurtisthompson
